data.name: One Belt One Road, CPEC and other Chinese initiatives: Where next after COVID-19?
data.summary:
The session covers:
• The current perception of China in South East Asia
• What next for One Belt One Road, the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor and other Chinese initiatives?
• If China’s stock has reduced, can India take its place on a global stage? Can it?
• What positive role can India play post this pandemic, be it in vaccine development, disaster recovery or otherwise?
data.speakers:
Speakers:
• Priyajit Debsarkar, Author, The Last Raja of West Pakistan
• Matthew Henderson, Director of Asia Studies, Henry Jackson Society
• Deep Pal, Non Resident Fellow, The National Bureau of Asian Research 
• Ashwin Kumaraswamy, DeepTech VC
